declarations.comments: 複素数型
declarations.title: Complex

declarations.comments: Disables the parent's transform, forcing it to draw from the origin. Heavy use is deprecated.
declarations.title: absolute

declarations.comments: Embeds the action of Effect into the Picture.
declarations.title: absorb

declarations.comments: It is not recommended to use this system except for the glapple system.
declarations.title: absorb'

declarations.comments:
Draw an arc with stroke.
Property angle is the rotation angle from the start position.
A positive number will cause a clockwise rotation, 2π will make a perfect circle, and 4π will return to a blank state.
declarations.title: arc

declarations.comments: Set color
declarations.title: color

declarations.comments:
Combine images using the specified combining method.
Issue: Synthesis of the combined image behaves unexpectedly.
ex) x <-+ (y <-^ z) = (x <-+ y) <-^ z
declarations.title: composite

declarations.comments:
Draw a picture
It is not recommended to use this except for the glapple system.
declarations.title: drawPicture

declarations.comments: Retrieves the current transform state and draws a Picture.
declarations.title: drawWithTransform

declarations.comments: Empty picture.
declarations.title: empty

declarations.comments:
Draw a fan.
Property angle is the rotation angle from the start position.
A positive number will cause a clockwise rotation, 2π will make a perfect circle, and 4π will return to a blank state.
declarations.title: fan

declarations.comments: Set font.
declarations.title: font

declarations.comments: Draw line.
declarations.title: line

declarations.comments: Set lineWidth.
declarations.title: lineWidth

declarations.comments: Set opacity.
declarations.title: opacity

declarations.comments: Add color or pattern.
declarations.title: paint

declarations.comments: Draw polygon.
declarations.title: polygon

declarations.comments: Draw rectangle.
declarations.title: rect

declarations.comments: Draws the sprite loaded by runGame.
declarations.title: sprite

declarations.comments: Draw text.
declarations.title: text

declarations.comments: Set textAlign.
declarations.title: textAlign

declarations.comments: Set textBaseLine.
declarations.title: textBaseLine

declarations.comments:
コンポーネントの Transform を表す型
適用順は Rotate -> Translate
declarations.title: Transform

declarations.comments: 親，子の順番で Transform を渡して，子のグローバルなTransformを計算する
declarations.title: computeChildTransform

declarations.comments: オブジェクトがクリックされたときに呼ばれます．
declarations.title: useClick

declarations.comments:
Destroy a component.
When destroy on top level of component, need to be called last.
declarations.title: useDestroy

declarations.comments:
Destroy a component on top level of component.
Need to be called last.
declarations.title: useDestroyNow

declarations.comments:
useHover は，マウスがホバーしているかどうかを判定する．
クリック判定などに使用する．
第1引数(layer)が小さいほど手前にあり，優先される．
layerが同じ場合は順序は保障されない．
declarations.title: useHover

declarations.comments:
A key event hook.
If you want to get state of specific key, use 'useKeyState' hook.
declarations.title: useKeyEvent

declarations.comments: Hooks sprite a の処理をモナド Effect 内で実行できるようにする
declarations.title: useLazy

declarations.comments:
Rendererを追加します．
第1引数(layer)の値が小さいほど手前に描画されます．
declarations.title: useRenderer

declarations.comments:
子コンポーネントを生成
子コンポーネントのTransformは親のTransformが基準になる
declarations.title: useChildRunner

declarations.comments: コンポーネントを生成
declarations.title: useRunner
